title: Create /update Skill for Story Management
description: Create a new /update skill that provides the correct way to add stories to a PRD. Handles both cases: when Ralph is running (use update.json) and when Ralph is not running (edit index.json directly).

acceptanceCriteria.text: Create skills/update/SKILL.md with router and quick actions
Create workflows/add-story.md - how to add a single story
Create workflows/add-multiple.md - how to add multiple stories
Document story JSON format: {text, checked} for criteria, NOT strings
Document when to use update.json (Ralph active) vs index.json (Ralph not active)
Document ID conventions: US-XXX, BUG-XXX, V-XXX
